group_1.textLeft: Hey...I'm not big on talkin' in circles, so@I'm gonna cut straight to the point...
Is the girl who's spreadin' this rumor@around...you, by any chance?
Sorry if I got it wrong, but I gotta ask...
It's just the timing of when the rumor@started, plus what it's about...
And there's all these girls who didn't tell@anyone, but somehow know it...
Did you transform and spread the rumor?

group_1.textRight: I didn't even think...it'd get around@this much...
We really aren't allowed to bring chocolate@to school.
If I could just spin it into a "Rumor"...
I thought maybe it'd take your mind off @what happened before.
I just didn't want you to have to suffer@through any more bad memories.
Then it spun out of control before I noticed@and... *Sob*

group_1.textLeft: You sure did somethin' silly. And for me@of all people...!
Rena, I'm sorry I made you feel you had to@do all that...
But ya know, it's just like I said before.
I'd be happy if no one got bothered by@rumors.
I just want them to have a great Valentine's@Day.

group_1.textRight: What should I do about this then...?

group_1.textLeft: Hmmm, let's see what I can think up...
